title: Papa Beaver's Storytime
resume: Papa Beaver's Storytime is a French and Canadian animated television series based on a series of children's story books by the French author Père Castor. The series which was produced by Cinar, originally aired between 1993–1994 on the Canadian Family Channel and the French channel France 3 and in Zouzous on France 5 and later on the American channel, Nick Jr. between 1994-1997.
